00051 Transform::Transform()
00052 {
00053         m_mdir = m_minv = new Matrix4x4;
00054 }
00055 
00056 Transform::Transform( const SoTransform& coinTransform )
00057 {
00058         SbMatrix coinMatrix;
00059         coinMatrix.setTransform( coinTransform.translation.getValue(),
00060                                          coinTransform.rotation.getValue(),
00061                                          coinTransform.scaleFactor.getValue(),
00062                                              coinTransform.scaleOrientation.getValue(),
00063                                              coinTransform.center.getValue() );                         
00064         
00065         m_mdir = new Matrix4x4( coinMatrix[0][0], coinMatrix[1][0], coinMatrix[2][0], coinMatrix[3][0],
00066                                                         coinMatrix[0][1], coinMatrix[1][1], coinMatrix[2][1], coinMatrix[3][1],
00067                                                         coinMatrix[0][2], coinMatrix[1][2], coinMatrix[2][2], coinMatrix[3][2],
00068                                                         coinMatrix[0][3], coinMatrix[1][3], coinMatrix[2][3], coinMatrix[3][3] );
00069                                 
00070         m_minv = m_mdir->Inverse();
00071 }
00072 
00073 Transform::Transform( double mat[4][4] )
00074 {
00075         m_mdir = new Matrix4x4( mat[0][0],mat[0][1],mat[0][2],mat[0][3],
00076                                 mat[1][0],mat[1][1],mat[1][2],mat[1][3],
00077                                 mat[2][0],mat[2][1],mat[2][2],mat[2][3],
00078                                 mat[3][0],mat[3][1],mat[3][2],mat[3][3] );
00079         m_minv = m_mdir->Inverse();
00080 }
00081 
00082 Transform::Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir )
00083 : m_mdir(mdir)
00084 {
00085         m_minv = m_mdir->Inverse();
00086 }

00088 Transform::Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir, const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& minv )
00089 : m_mdir(mdir), m_minv(minv)
00090 {
00091 }

00093 Transform::Transform( double t00, double t01, double t02, double t03,
00094                           double t10, double t11, double t12, double t13,
00095                           double t20, double t21, double t22, double t23,
00096                           double t30, double t31, double t32, double t33 )
00097 {
00098         m_mdir = new Matrix4x4( t00, t01, t02, t03,
00099                                 t10, t11, t12, t13,
00100                                 t20, t21, t22, t23,
00101                                 t30, t31, t32, t33 );
00102         m_minv = m_mdir->Inverse();
00103 
00104 }

00106 Transform::	Transform( const Transform& rhs )
00107 : m_mdir(rhs.m_mdir), m_minv(rhs.m_minv)
00108 {
00109 }

00111 Transform Transform::GetInverse() const
00112 {
00113         return Transform( m_minv, m_mdir );     
00114 }       
00115 
00116 Transform Transform::Transpose() const
00117 {
00118         return Transform( m_mdir->Transpose(), m_mdir->Transpose()->Inverse() );        
00119 }
00120 
00121 Point3D Transform::operator()( const Point3D& point ) const 
00122 {    
00123         double x = point.x, y = point.y, z = point.z;
00124         double xp = m_mdir->m[0][0]*x + m_mdir->m[0][1]*y + m_mdir->m[0][2]*z + m_mdir->m[0][3];
00125         double yp = m_mdir->m[1][0]*x + m_mdir->m[1][1]*y + m_mdir->m[1][2]*z + m_mdir->m[1][3];
00126         double zp = m_mdir->m[2][0]*x + m_mdir->m[2][1]*y + m_mdir->m[2][2]*z + m_mdir->m[2][3];
00127         double wp = m_mdir->m[3][0]*x + m_mdir->m[3][1]*y + m_mdir->m[3][2]*z + m_mdir->m[3][3];
00128 
00129         if( wp == 1.0 ) return Point3D( xp, yp, zp );
00130         else return Point3D( xp, yp, zp )/wp;
00131 
00132 }
00133 
00134 void Transform::operator()( const Point3D& point, Point3D* transformedPoint ) const
00135 {
00136         double x = point.x, y = point.y, z = point.z;
00137         transformedPoint->x = m_mdir->m[0][0]*x + m_mdir->m[0][1]*y + m_mdir->m[0][2]*z + m_mdir->m[0][3];
00138         transformedPoint->y = m_mdir->m[1][0]*x + m_mdir->m[1][1]*y + m_mdir->m[1][2]*z + m_mdir->m[1][3];
00139         transformedPoint->z = m_mdir->m[2][0]*x + m_mdir->m[2][1]*y + m_mdir->m[2][2]*z + m_mdir->m[2][3];
00140         double transformedW = m_mdir->m[3][0]*x + m_mdir->m[3][1]*y + m_mdir->m[3][2]*z + m_mdir->m[3][3];
00141         if( transformedW != 1.0 ) *transformedPoint /= transformedW;
00142 }
00143 
00144 Vector3D Transform::operator()( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00145 {
00146         double x = vector.x, y = vector.y, z = vector.z;
00147         return Vector3D( m_mdir->m[0][0]*x + m_mdir->m[0][1]*y + m_mdir->m[0][2]*z,
00148                                  m_mdir->m[1][0]*x + m_mdir->m[1][1]*y + m_mdir->m[1][2]*z,
00149                                  m_mdir->m[2][0]*x + m_mdir->m[2][1]*y + m_mdir->m[2][2]*z );
00150 }
00151 
00152 void Transform::operator()( const Vector3D& vector, Vector3D* transformedVector ) const
00153 {
00154         double x = vector.x, y = vector.y, z = vector.z;
00155         transformedVector->x = m_mdir->m[0][0]*x + m_mdir->m[0][1]*y + m_mdir->m[0][2]*z;
00156         transformedVector->y = m_mdir->m[1][0]*x + m_mdir->m[1][1]*y + m_mdir->m[1][2]*z;
00157         transformedVector->z = m_mdir->m[2][0]*x + m_mdir->m[2][1]*y + m_mdir->m[2][2]*z;
00158 }

00160 Normal Transform::operator()( const Normal& normal ) const 
00161 {
00162         double x = normal.x, y = normal.y, z = normal.z;
00163         return Normal( m_minv->m[0][0]*x + m_minv->m[1][0]*y + m_minv->m[2][0]*z,
00164                    m_minv->m[0][1]*x + m_minv->m[1][1]*y + m_minv->m[2][1]*z,
00165                    m_minv->m[0][2]*x + m_minv->m[1][2]*y + m_minv->m[2][2]*z );
00166 }
00167 
00168 void Transform::operator()( const Normal& normal, Normal* transformedNormal ) const
00169 {
00170         double x = normal.x, y = normal.y, z = normal.z;
00171         transformedNormal->x = m_minv->m[0][0]*x + m_minv->m[1][0]*y + m_minv->m[2][0]*z;
00172         transformedNormal->y = m_minv->m[0][1]*x + m_minv->m[1][1]*y + m_minv->m[2][1]*z;
00173         transformedNormal->z = m_minv->m[0][2]*x + m_minv->m[1][2]*y + m_minv->m[2][2]*z;
00174 }

00176 Ray Transform::operator()( const Ray& ray ) const
00177 {
00178         Ray transformedRay;
00179         ( *this )( ray.origin, &transformedRay.origin );
00180         ( *this )( ray.direction, &transformedRay.direction );
00181         transformedRay.mint = ray.mint;
00182         transformedRay.maxt = ray.maxt;
00183         return transformedRay;  
00184 }

00187 {
00188         ( *this )( ray.origin, &transformedRay->origin );
00189         ( *this )( ray.direction, &transformedRay->direction );
00190         transformedRay->mint = ray.mint;
00191         transformedRay->maxt = ray.maxt;
00192 }

00194 BBox Transform::operator()( const BBox& bbox  ) const
00195 {
00196         const Transform& M = *this;
00197         BBox ret(  M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00198         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00199         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00200         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00201         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00202         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00203         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00204         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00205         return ret;
00206 }
00207 
00208 void Transform::operator()( const BBox& bbox, BBox* transformedBbox  ) const
00209 {
00210         const Transform &M = *this;
00211         transformedBbox = new BBox(          M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00212         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00213         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00214         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00215         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00216         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00217         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00218         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00219 }

00221 
00222 Transform Transform::operator*( const Transform& rhs ) const 
00223 {
00224         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = Mul( m_mdir, rhs.m_mdir );
00225         Ptr<Matrix4x4> minv = Mul( rhs.m_minv, m_minv );
00226         return Transform( mdir, minv );
00227 }
00228 
00229 bool Transform::SwapsHandedness( ) const 
00230 {
00231         double det = ( ( m_mdir->m[0][0] * 
00232                            ( m_mdir->m[1][1] * m_mdir->m[2][2] - 
00233                              m_mdir->m[1][2] * m_mdir->m[2][1] ) ) -
00234                    ( m_mdir->m[0][1] *
00235                        ( m_mdir->m[1][0] * m_mdir->m[2][2] -
00236                          m_mdir->m[1][2] * m_mdir->m[2][0] ) ) +
00237                    ( m_mdir->m[0][2] *
00238                        ( m_mdir->m[1][0] * m_mdir->m[2][1] -
00239                          m_mdir->m[1][1] * m_mdir->m[2][0] ) ) );
00240         return det < 0.0;
00241 }
00242 
00243 bool Transform::operator==( const Transform& tran ) const
00244 {
00245     if( this == &tran ) 
00246         return true;
00247     else 
00248     return( 
00249         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[0][0] - tran.m_mdir->m[0][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00250         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[0][1] - tran.m_mdir->m[0][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00251         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[0][2] - tran.m_mdir->m[0][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00252         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[0][3] - tran.m_mdir->m[0][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00253         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[1][0] - tran.m_mdir->m[1][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00254         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[1][1] - tran.m_mdir->m[1][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00255         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[1][2] - tran.m_mdir->m[1][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00256         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[1][3] - tran.m_mdir->m[1][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00257         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[2][0] - tran.m_mdir->m[2][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00258         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[2][1] - tran.m_mdir->m[2][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00259         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[2][2] - tran.m_mdir->m[2][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00260         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[2][3] - tran.m_mdir->m[2][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00261         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[3][0] - tran.m_mdir->m[3][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00262         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[3][1] - tran.m_mdir->m[3][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00263         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[3][2] - tran.m_mdir->m[3][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00264         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[3][3] - tran.m_mdir->m[3][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) );
00265 }
00266 
00267 Transform Translate( const Vector3D& delta ) 
00268 {
00269         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4(   1.0,   0.0,   0.0,  delta.x,
00270                                            0.0,   1.0,   0.0,  delta.y,
00271                                            0.0,   0.0,   1.0,  delta.z,
00272                                            0.0,   0.0,   0.0,      1.0  );
00273 
00274         Ptr<Matrix4x4> minv = new Matrix4x4(   1.0,   0.0,   0.0, -delta.x,
00275                                            0.0,   1.0,   0.0, -delta.y,
00276                                            0.0,   0.0,   1.0, -delta.z,
00277                                            0.0,   0.0,   0.0,      1.0  );
00278                                            
00279         return Transform( mdir, minv );
00280 }
00281 
00282 Transform Translate( double x, double y, double z)
00283 {
00284         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4(   1.0,   0.0,   0.0,   x,
00285                                            0.0,   1.0,   0.0,   y,
00286                                            0.0,   0.0,   1.0,   z,
00287                                            0.0,   0.0,   0.0, 1.0 );
00288 
00289         Ptr<Matrix4x4> minv = new Matrix4x4(   1.0,   0.0,   0.0,   -x,
00290                                            0.0,   1.0,   0.0,   -y,
00291                                            0.0,   0.0,   1.0,   -z,
00292                                            0.0,   0.0,   0.0,  1.0 );
00293 
00294         return Transform( mdir, minv );
00295 }
00296 
00297 Transform Scale( double sx, double sy, double sz ) 
00298 {
00299         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4(    sx,     0.0,    0.0,  0.0,
00300                                            0.0,      sy,    0.0,  0.0,
00301                                            0.0,     0.0,     sz,  0.0,
00302                                            0.0,     0.0,    0.0,  1.0 );
00303                                            
00304         Ptr<Matrix4x4> minv = new Matrix4x4( 1.0/sx,    0.0,    0.0,  0.0,
00305                                             0.0, 1.0/sy,    0.0,  0.0,
00306                                             0.0,    0.0, 1.0/sz,  0.0,
00307                                             0.0,    0.0,    0.0,  1.0 );
00308 
00309         return Transform( mdir, minv );
00310 }
00311 
00312 Transform RotateX( double angle ) 
00313 {
00314         // angle is assumed to be in radians.
00315         double sinAngle = sin( angle );
00316         double cosAngle = cos( angle );
00317 
00318         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4( 1.0,      0.0,       0.0, 0.0,
00319                                          0.0, cosAngle, -sinAngle, 0.0,
00320                                          0.0, sinAngle,  cosAngle, 0.0,
00321                                          0.0,      0.0,       0.0, 1.0  );
00322                              
00323         return Transform( mdir, mdir->Transpose() );
00324 }
00325 
00326 Transform RotateY(double angle) 
00327 {
00328         // angle is assumed to be in radians.   
00329         double sinAngle = sin( angle );
00330         double cosAngle = cos( angle );
00331         
00332         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4( cosAngle, 0.0, sinAngle, 0.0,
00333                                               0.0, 1.0,      0.0, 0.0,
00334                                         -sinAngle, 0.0, cosAngle, 0.0,
00335                                               0.0, 0.0,      0.0, 1.0  ); 
00336                                  
00337         return Transform( mdir, mdir->Transpose() );
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00341 Transform RotateZ( double angle ) 
00342 {
00343         // angle is assumed to be in radians.   
00344         double sinAngle = sin( angle );
00345         double cosAngle = cos( angle );
00346         
00347         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4( cosAngle, -sinAngle, 0.0, 0.0,
00348                                          sinAngle,  cosAngle, 0.0, 0.0,
00349                                               0.0,       0.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00350                                               0.0,       0.0, 0.0, 1.0 );
00351                                               
00352         return Transform( mdir, mdir->Transpose() );
00353 }
00354 
00355 Transform Rotate( double angle, const Vector3D& axis ) 
00356 {
00357         // angle is assumed to be in radians.
00358         Vector3D a = Normalize( axis );
00359         double s = sin( angle );
00360         double c = cos( angle );
00361         double m[4][4];
00362 
00363         m[0][0] = a.x * a.x + (1.0 - a.x * a.x) * c;
00364         m[0][1] = a.x * a.y * (1.0 - c) - a.z * s;
00365         m[0][2] = a.x * a.z * (1.0 - c) + a.y * s;
00366         m[0][3] = 0.0;
00367 
00368         m[1][0] = a.x * a.y * (1.0 - c) + a.z * s;
00369         m[1][1] = a.y * a.y + (1.0 - a.y * a.y) * c;
00370         m[1][2] = a.y * a.z * (1.0 - c) - a.x * s;
00371         m[1][3] = 0.0;
00372 
00373         m[2][0] = a.x * a.z * (1.0 - c) - a.y * s;
00374         m[2][1] = a.y * a.z * (1.0 - c) + a.x * s;
00375         m[2][2] = a.z * a.z + (1.0 - a.z * a.z) * c;
00376         m[2][3] = 0.0;
00377 
00378         m[3][0] = 0.0;
00379         m[3][1] = 0.0;
00380         m[3][2] = 0.0;
00381         m[3][3] = 1.0;
00382 
00383         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4( m );
00384         return Transform( mdir, mdir->Transpose() );
00385 }
00386 
00387 Transform LookAt( const Point3D& pos, const Point3D& look, const Vector3D& up )
00388 {
00389         double m[4][4];
00390         m[0][3] = pos.x;
00391         m[1][3] = pos.y;
00392         m[2][3] = pos.z;
00393         m[3][3] = 1.0;
00394         
00395         Vector3D dir = Normalize( look - pos );
00396         Vector3D right = CrossProduct( dir, Normalize( up ) );
00397         Vector3D newUp = CrossProduct( right, dir );
00398 
00399         m[0][0] = right.x;
00400         m[1][0] = right.y;
00401         m[2][0] = right.z;
00402         m[3][0] = 0.0;
00403         
00404         m[0][1] = dir.x;
00405         m[1][1] = dir.y;
00406         m[2][1] = dir.z;
00407         m[3][1] = 0.0;
00408         
00409         m[0][2] = newUp.x;
00410         m[1][2] = newUp.y;
00411         m[2][2] = newUp.z;
00412         m[3][2] = 0.0;
00413 
00414         Ptr<Matrix4x4> camToWorld = new Matrix4x4( m );
00415         return Transform( camToWorld->Inverse(), camToWorld );
00416 }
00417 
00418 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Transform& tran )
00419 {
00420         os << (*tran.GetMatrix());
00421         return os;
00422 }
